video.title: Hoarders: Collection
video.synopsis: This reality series reveals the lives of extreme hoarders, following their progress as they get help for their disorder and have their homes cleaned.

episodes.synopsis: A Texas woman becomes viciously defensive over suggestions she throw things away; a Georgia widow steals things from everywhere -- even church.
episodes.title: Jan / Bebe

episodes.synopsis: A California couple competes to see who can accumulate the most stuff; a Maryland man sacrifices basic needs to maintain his growing stash of junk.
episodes.title: Lee & BG / Chris

episodes.synopsis: A Texas man must clean up his house in order to win back custody of his grandkids; an Oklahoma woman hoards in the wake of three failed marriages.
episodes.title: Manuel & Carla

episodes.synopsis: A California man stubbornly believes his collection of papers is valuable; an Ohio woman's house is so cluttered she lives in her truck.
episodes.title: Ron / Carol

episodes.synopsis: A New Jersey man believes his very identity is bound up in his collection of memorabilia; a Texas woman's hoarding alienates her daughter.
episodes.title: Randy / Vicki

episodes.synopsis: A California man's hoard of automobiles could cost him millions in fines; a pregnant woman's hoarding could cause her to lose custody of her kids.
episodes.title: Roy / Loretta

episodes.synopsis: A Nebraska man's family feels the strain of his countless games, toys and dolls; a California woman risks losing custody of her granddaughter.
episodes.title: Billy Bob / Jean

episodes.synopsis: John, a retired corrections officer, lives in a house overrun by cats; Vivian tries to deal with the obsession that threatens to end her marriage.
episodes.title: John / Vivian

episodes.synopsis: Mary's family members visit and are shocked to discover she's a cat hoarder; Annie cleans houses for a living, but her own home is a disaster.
episodes.title: Mary / Annie

episodes.synopsis: Constance is a food hoarder whose daughter threatens to call the authorities; Jeri Jo's husband is a convicted murderer serving a life sentence.
episodes.title: Constance / Jeri Jo

episodes.synopsis: Thieves broke into Susan's house and stole from her hoard; Michael, the son of a Nazi officer, lives with his dog in the midst of clutter.
episodes.title: Susan / Michael

episodes.synopsis: Terry's house is packed with both living and dead cats; Adelle uses a bucket for a toilet and washes clothes in a kiddie pool.
episodes.title: Terry / Adelle

episodes.synopsis: Experts help former model Merlene, whose life began to disintegrate when she divorced her husband; Jeff tries to temper his compulsions.
episodes.title: Merlene / Jeff

episodes.synopsis: Diana hoards so much trash that her daughter is forced to sleep in a recliner; former antiques dealer Dolores has spiraled out of control.
episodes.title: Diana / Dolores

episodes.synopsis: Punk rockers stuff their home with records, comic books, mannequins and junk; a concerned niece is the only one willing to help a hoarding relative.
episodes.title: Fuzzie & Fredd / Nancy
